activities: We create online surveys at the direction of our clients.  We send email to our clients contacts inviting them to participate on an online survey hosted on our computer systems.  We collect the survey responses and pass this response data back to our clients that commissioned the survey.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: Any questions or concerns regarding the use or disclosure of personal information should be directed to  Inavero via an email to privacy@inavero.com, written letter to 715 SW Morrison St, Suite 400, Portland, OR 97205, or phone call to 800-921-2640. Inavero will investigate and attempt to resolve complaints and disputes regarding use and disclosure of personal information in accordance with the principles contained in this policy. For complaints that cannot be resolved between Inavero and the complainant, Inavero has agreed to participate in the dispute resolution procedures of the panel established by the European data protection authorities (EU DPAs), as well as to cooperate and comply with the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC) to resolve disputes pursuant to the Safe Harbor Principles.
